title: Hyperion Planning-Strategic finance Consultant at Reqroute (Anaheim, CA)
text: Source: Tech Fetch Hyperion Planning-Strategic finance Consultant Location: Anaheim, CA. Job Description: Required candidates must have strong experience in implementation and deployment of Essbase/Planning & Strategic Finance modules at multiple clients and industries (minimum of 3 end to end implementations) Proven prior data modeling and Dimensional Data Warehousing /architectural designing experience a must Should be able to develop strategy for implementation of several Hyperion modules Must have an understanding of Workforce Planning and Capex planning modules Required to have strong experience on working with FDM/FDMEE, Crystal Ball Reporting & DRM An understanding and core competency in software development lifecycle processes, concepts and techniques and experience in deploying, supporting and improving this, including an understanding of different Project Management methodologies. Must have the ability to communicate and work directly with end users. Must be a team player with good interpersonal, verbal and written communications skills. Must be able to work in stressful situations. Desired Skills: Hyperion Financial Manager Hyperion Financial Close Manager ARM Tax Provisioning
